full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN MA SGROL MA'I BSTOD PA PHYAG 'TSAL NYER GCIG GI BSHAD SBYAR NYER 'TSE'I GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BA'I ZA 'OG RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN MA 'PHAGS MA SGROL MA LA BSTOD PA PHYAG 'TSAL NYER GCIG GI BSHAD SBYAR NYER 'TSE'I GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BA'I ZA 'OG RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD BRTZON YANGS PA DGE SLONG YE SHES PHUN TSOGS DANG, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GNYIS KYIS SGROL BSTOD LA NGES DON GYI 'GREL PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS BSKUL BA NA, ,SPYIR DRANG NGES KYI DON LA BSHAD TSUL MI 'DRA BA MANG PO YOD KYANG, ,'DIR SNGAGS RANG SKAD KYI DRANG NGES LTAR BSHAD NA NGES TSIG GI STENG NAS 'GREL CHOG DAR SNUNG YANG, ,RANG NYID SGROL MA SBYANGS SHING YON TAN NYAG HA CANG PHRA BA'I DBANG GIS DE LTAR BRIS PA'I SPOBS PA MA BYUNG BA, ,'ON KYANG LAS SGRUB TSUL RNAMS NGES DON DU BYAS NA 'BREL CUNG ZAD CHAGS SHING SGROL MA YI DAM DU BSTEN PA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'ANG SRID SNYAM STE, ,DE LTAR DU 'GREL BA'I BYED PA PO NI MDO SMAD TZONG KHA'I YUL GYI NU BA PHYOGS RGYUD DU SKYES PA, ^ SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG GI GZUGS BRNYAN 'CHANG BA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO'AM, MING GZHAN GSER TOG CHOS KYI RGYAL POR 'BOD PAS KHAL KHA CUN CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BLO CHEN PO GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
